parameters.question: What happens when you tap the Share button after selecting a piece of text to share?
parameters.choice1: A dialog asks you to save or delete the text.
parameters.choice2: A browser searches the text on the web.
parameters.choice3: A dialog asks you to choose a sharing destination.
parameters.choice4: A email app composes a new email with the selected text.
parameters.answer: A dialog asks you to choose a sharing destination.
